sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage', templateUrl: './homepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage.component.css'] }) export class HomepageComponent { cartItemCount = 0; // Default cart count constructor() {} addToCart() { this.cartItemCount++; // Simulates adding items to the cart } currentBackground = 'assets/default-bg.jpg'; // Default background changeBackground(category: string) { const backgrounds = { mobiles: 'assets/mobiles-bg.jpg', laptops: 'assets/laptops-bg.jpg', headphones: 'assets/headphones-bg.jpg' }; this.currentBackground = backgrounds[category] || 'assets/default-bg.jpg'; } resetBackground() { this.currentBackground = 'assets/default-bg.jpg'; // Reset to default } }
